price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߞߋߟߊ ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߕߍߕߊ ߟߊ߫ ߥߊߡߌ߫
arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyatan
